resources.string: No cameras with a microphone found on this server.
Audio is disabled for this server.
Unable to connect to a server with the provided details.
Unable to log in with the provided credentials.
Unable to play audio from this microphone.
Unable to play audio from this microphone. Live audio is not supported.
Unable to get the list of cameras for this server.
Unable to play audio. Feature is disabled on the server.
Unable to play audio. Insufficient user rights.
Audio sample of MIP SDK Mobile

"This sample application demonstrates how to use the MIP SDK Mobile to play audio from the microphone of a camera.
The application contains a login screen where users need to provide login details for a Mobile Server.
After successful login the application loads from the server a list will all cameras that have a microphone.
When users select a camera from the list they are able play live audio from this camera's microphone."
